duties_responsibilities.duty: Assemble parts into a welding jig and tack them per prints, drawing, or instruction of supervisor.
Use various hand tools such as grinders, scrapers, or other types of finishing tools to ensure quality product.
Keep work area clean, neat, and orderly to ensure a safe and efficient workspace.
Attend, and interact in all safety meetings every day.
Control operation of Robot, cleaning, and inspection.

education_certification.credential: High School / GED diploma required, Technical certification preferred
